sentences.english: You turn bright red after drinking two tablespoons of beer.
sentences.chinese: 你在猛灌兩大勺啤酒後面色變的紅潤光鮮。

sentences.english: Looking good in Italy is a national obsession.
sentences.chinese: 追求光鮮體面的外表是意大利人癡迷的執念。

sentences.english: It's very sparkly, sparkly street, I would say, and very clean as well.
sentences.chinese: 這條街非常光鮮亮麗，我想說，也很乾淨。

sentences.english: Leaves of banyans nearby are so bright after the rain wash.
sentences.chinese: 近處的榕樹銀杏經過雨水的滋潤之後更顯得光鮮。

sentences.english: She was blinded by the glitter and the glamour of her own life.
sentences.chinese: 她被自己的生活中表面上的光鮮與奢華所矇蔽。

sentences.english: The well-dressed woman looked down her nose at my jeans and sneakers.
sentences.chinese: 那個衣着光鮮的女子輕蔑地打量我的牛仔褲和球鞋。

sentences.english: He was well dressed and carried a smart leather attaché case.
sentences.chinese: 他衣着光鮮，拎着一個漂亮的真皮公文包。

sentences.english: Before I took the car on the road I shined it up real nice.
sentences.chinese: 還沒開車上路之前，我把車子弄得非常光鮮好看。

sentences.english: Well-dressed clients were talking in polite undertones as they ate.
sentences.chinese: 衣着光鮮的顧客們邊喫邊斯文地低聲聊着天。

sentences.english: Not only the singers are good-looking, but also they are millionaires and millionairesses.
sentences.chinese: 他們不僅有光鮮亮麗的外表，而且都是富翁和富婆。

sentences.english: A few expressions deal with the less glamorous side of fashion.
sentences.chinese: 有些新名詞描述了時尚圈不太光鮮的一面。

definition: dignity/face (as in "losing face")/honorable/creditable/(of sb's appearance) presentable/respectable
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
to leave one's homeplace (to find work, flee disaster etc)
